title: Styles and Wallpapers crashing
content:
Hi, I'm having some issues with the styles and wallpapers app. The styles part specifically, I created and applied style and after that I deleted it. Problem is I can't access the style menu anymore, it crashes when I try.

I've already deleted the cache and the storage of the app, to no avail unfortunately. 

Help, I can't stand this font ðŸ˜‚
